Fantech Korsi GC-191 Red Gaming Chair

These new Fantech gaming chairs featured with two included cushions: a head cushion and a lumbar cushion. If you want a more straight and upright sitting position, remove the cushions. You can Pull the lever located on the side, tilt back and relax. Here, The backrest allows a positioning adjustment upt to 180 degrees and also adjust the seatâ€™s inclination and lock it in your prefered position. This id designed with 4D adjustment, these are - height, horizontal angle, forward / backward and interior / exterior positioning. The Fantech Korsi GC-191 Red Gaming Chair comes with no warranty.

full_description:
Fantech Alpha GC-283 Sakura Edition Gaming Chair

The FANTECH GC-283's ergonomic design makes it easy on your back and posture for extended periods of use. It includes two soft adjustable pillows a lumbar cushion for your back and a headrest pillow for your neck and head when using your computer.

Fine Core Materials

The Fantech Alpha GC-283 Sakura Edition Gaming Chair is composed of High-Quality Core Materials. PU leather is the most sensible upholstery to be used today and we at Fantech have handpicked the best variation of it. our signature PU leather is very durable, soft, flexible, and waterproof. We combine that with precisely cut cold-cure foam that provides immaculate cushioning and support to deliver a heavenly sitting experience.

Multi-Functional Tilling Mechanism

The Fantech Alpha GC-283 Sakura Edition Gaming Chair Mechanisms, which range from single-function to multi-function, provide you with complete control over the seat suspension. The ALHPA may be secured in an inclined position and tilted back in an upright position.

Lock in Your Gaming Position

The Fantech Alpha GC-283 Gaming Chair When it comes to ergonomics. We shall not just mention the chair's outline. Each fintech's armrest is meant to be both comfortable and adaptable. We widen the armrest and may adjust it up and down. Front and rear left 30Â° - right 30Â° Nonetheless, it is comprised of a robust material that is comfortable to the touch while maintaining a decent grip.

Class 4 Hydraulic Pistons

The Fantech Alpha GC-283 Gaming Chair Length of our Class 4 hydraulic pistonsâ€”best in class in consistency, stability, and safety has been upgraded to accommodate a broader range of user heights. This helps you to keep your feet firmly planted on the floor, avoiding hanging feet that may restrict blood circulation to your lower body.

The Best Build Quality & Perfectly Ergonomic

The Fantech Alpha GC-283 Gaming Chair design is based on car racing seats, which have been shown to provide the optimum support and weight distribution to the human body to allow extended hours of playing or usage in front of a computer and office. Every fintech chair is made with high-quality materials, expert craftsmanship, and cutting-edge manufacturing technology.
